about_the_game:
My Life in a Monster Girl Paradise is a 2D Erotic Monster Girl Game. The game focuses mainly on Monster Girl Collecting and Dating, combined with a simple Battle-fuck system and Temptation Scenes. This game is still in the early stages of development.

  • Monster Girl Races:Minotaur, Lamia, Alraune, Kitsune, Centaur, Mershark, Eel, Scylla, Dullahan, Goblin, Arachne, Harpy, Slime, Succubus.

  • Battle-Fuck: WithTempation Scenes.

  • Befriend: Talk with the girls during battle or give them gifts.

  • Collect Materials: Fix the houses for the girls to live in after you befriend them.

  • Marriage: Once your relationship is deep enough, you can marry your favorite girl.

  • Dating: Build up your relationship by inviting your chosen one for a date.

  • Minigames: Fishing, Tavern Serving, Quiz, Maze, Escape.

  • Planned Content: Pregnancy, Vaginal Sex.

  • Kink and Tag List: 2DCG, Animated, Femdom, Monster Girls, Degenerate, Milf, Roleplay, Reverse Rape, Oraljob, Footjob, Paizuri, Cunnilingus, Absjob, Threesome, Hairjob, Toy, Virgin, Interracial, Male Protag, Close Relationship, Vore.

If you are interested in this project, please consider adding it to your wishlist, or if you already bought the game and enjoyed it so far, please leave a review.
